name: Notice.AAA6.JudgmentsOnline.SetAsideError.Defendant
titleEn: The judgment made against you has been set aside (removed)
titleCy: Mae’r dyfarniad yn eich erbyn wedi cael ei roi o’r naill du (wedi’i ddileu)
descriptionEn: You’ll receive an update with information about next steps.
descriptionCy: Byddwch yn cael diweddariad gyda gwybodaeth am y camau nesaf.
